MD.analysis

Package MD.analysis

methods for analyzing particle trajectories. More...

Packages

package  bond_order
 

methods for local bond ordering of a group of particles in simulation.


package  center_mass
 

This module is used to find the center of mass of particles.


package  connections
 

This module is used to find connections between particle over a series of frames.


package  histogram
 

This module is used for creating a histogram of data.


package  lifetime
 

finds lifetime of connections made by groups of particles


package  msd
 

This module msd of atoms and takes into account drift of system by subtracting out center of mass.


package  msdr
 

Find the deviation of every particle from its point on the recipricol lattice.


package  nearest_neighbor
 

methods for finding nearest neighbors of particles in a simulation.


package  particle_distance
 

This module is used to find the distance between many particles.


package  percolate
 

This module is used to find a network graph between particle over a series of frames.


package  pyplot
 

This module is used for making simple plots on the fly using matplotlib.


package  reconstruct_lattice
 

This module is used to reconstruct the real space lattice from a structure factor q vectors(note this isn't a very reliable method).


package  rotation
 

This module is used to find rotations of particles in time.


Detailed Description

methods for analyzing particle trajectories.

Contains methods which are able to meant to aid in analyzing trajectories of MD data.
